text: "The Guitar Man" is a 1972 song by American band Bread and is the title track from their fifth studio album Guitar Man. It went to number 6 in Canada, number 8 in New Zealand, number 11 in the United States, number 14 in Ireland, number 16 in the United Kingdom and number 22 in Australia. Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Bread (band) songs Category:Cake (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: The Guitar Man
